item.title: Comment on Saturday assorted links by LBV78
item.description:
As a Person Who Used Drugs the 13% number is not believable. Drug user human social networks transmit information, true and false, quickly; who is holding, who got busted, who is a snitch, which dealers are being watched. The idea that decriminalization occurred and 87% of the users didn’t find out is not credible.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/saturday-assorted-links-476.html?commentID=160814531
